description:
The 10th pack of additional characters is here!

Introducing the White Wolf Tengu Momiji Inubashiri!
She's a special character with unique special cards and the ability to mix in Awakening Bubbles among her Blank Bubbles.

Also includes ShinRa-Bansho's popular song "Nanjiha Hakurounariya" feat. Ayaponzu*!

This pack contains the following:

■One character

"Momiji Inubashiri"

・Ability: "Awakening Bubble" are mixed in with Blank Bubbles.

・Spell Card
①Mountain Nomad "Expellee's Canaan"
Change bubble in the area to the color of Loaded Bubble in a spiral shape.
②Fang Sign "Chewing Satisfaction"
Reduces your Blank Bubbles Cache by 100. Your Awakening Gauge increases when your Blank Bubble Cache decreases.
③Dog Sign "Rabies Bite"
Opponent automatically fires 8 shots. Opponent can only aim or do a Rhythm Beat while it is effective.

■1 Song 
・Nanjiha Hakurounariya feat. Ayaponzu* / ShinRa-Bansho

■1 Challenge Stage
・Lv.8 Momiji Inubashiri Enters the Arena!

* Internet connection required for purchase.
* You will need to restart the game after purchasing contents.
name: Character Pack Momiji Inubashiri
